snippet: Legislation by a bipartisan group of senators, set for introduction on Tuesday, would demand tough border controls but provide a 13-year path to citizenship for certain illegal immigrants.
abstract: Bipartisan group of eight senators plans to unveil sweeping immigration legislation that is likely to ignite months-long battle between those who want citizenship for nation's 11 million illegal immigrants and opponents who view such approach as amnesty.
lead_paragraph: Legislation by a bipartisan group of senators, set for introduction on Tuesday, would demand tough border controls but provide a 13-year path to citizenship for certain illegal immigrants.

headline.seo: Senate Immigration Overhaul Likely to Set Off Fight
headline.main: Immigration Overhaul Proposal Is Likely to Ignite Fierce Debate
headline.print_headline: Immigration Overhaul Proposal Is Likely to Ignite Fierce Debate
